definition: diclofenac sodium (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller)/also called voltaren 扶他林
pinyin: er4 lu:4 ben3 an4 ben3 yi3 suan1 na4

sentences.english: Adsorption of chlorobenzene from mixed gas by activated carbon was studied on fixed bed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯苯气体在活性炭固定床上的吸附过程。

sentences.english: P-dichlorobenzene has no mutagenic effect according to these tests.
sentences.chinese: 结论该试验范围内，未见对二氯苯有致突变性。

sentences.english: Chlorobenzene sulfonyl chloride was synthesized with chlorobenzene as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以氯苯为原料，合成了对氯苯磺酰氯。

sentences.english: Chlorobenzene sulfonyl chloride was synthesized with chlorobenzene as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以氯苯为原料，合成了对氯苯磺酰氯。

sentences.english: The p dichlorobenzene and naphthalene in mothproofing agent was determined by infrared spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 用红外光谱法测定了防蛀剂中对二氯苯和萘的含量。

sentences.english: A range of polymers which are made from sodium sulfide and p-dichlorobenzene.
sentences.chinese: 由硫化钠和对二氯苯制成的一系列聚合物。

sentences.english: The p-chlorophenyl isocyanate is synthesised by carbonyl chloride and p-chloroaniline.
sentences.chinese: 采用光气与对氯苯胺合成对氯苯基异氰酸酯。

sentences.english: In this paper, A new and simple synthetic method of phenylphosphonic dichloride from direct oxidation of dichlorophenylphosphine was described.
sentences.chinese: 给出了二氯苯膦直接氧化合成苯膦酰二氯的方法。

sentences.english: Objective: To synthesize plant growth regulator-the ethyl p-chlorophenoxyacetate.
sentences.chinese: 目的合成植物生长调节剂对氯苯氧乙酸乙酯。

sentences.english: The result shows that this method is simple and practical.
sentences.chinese: 因此，对二氯苯干燥法是一个简便实用的干燥方法。

sentences.english: HCB is one of the indexes for monitoring the environmental and body's organochlorine compounds.
sentences.chinese: 六氯苯为监测环境和人体中有机氯化合物的指标之一。

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
